# Sampled signal: square wave

```{r}
f0 <- 8     # signal freq.
fs <- 1000  # sampling freq.
Ta <- 1     # acquisition time
dt <- 1/fs  # time step, i.e. sampling period

signal <- tibble(
  t = seq(dt, Ta, dt),
  ys = sin(2*pi*f0*t),
  yq = sign(ys)
)

signal %>% 
  pivot_longer(-t, names_to = "signal") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=t, y=value, color = signal)) +
  geom_line()
```
